sentences.en: D - histidine is a necessary acid for man and animal.
sentences.cn: 其中,D - 组氨酸是人体和动物必需的氨基酸.

sentences.en: Histidine A basic amino acid formed only rarely in proteins.
sentences.cn: 组氨酸:是蛋白质中少有的一种碱性氨基酸.

sentences.en: Other: The dyewood is known as the suppression histidine decarboxylase, the catechu phenol - O - methyl shift enzyme action.
sentences.cn: 其它: 染料木素有抑制组氨酸脱羧酶, 儿茶酚 -O- 甲基转移酶作用.

sentences.en: Plasma concentrations of excitatory amino acids serine, glycine, taurine and histidine in major depression.
sentences.cn: 血浆兴奋性氨基酸,丝氨酸, 甘氨酸, 牛磺酸和组氨酸的抑郁症.

sentences.en: Ribose phosphates are components of various coenzymes and are used by microorganisms in synthesizing histidine.
sentences.cn: 核糖磷酸基是各种辅的成分,微生物靠它来合成组氨酸.

sentences.en: The kinase transfers the phosphate from an autophosphorylated histidine and thus (why thus?) is often reversible, with the kinase acting as a phosphatase as well.
sentences.cn: 这个激酶从自我磷酸的组氨酸上转移磷酸基，因此（为什么是这样）通常是可逆的，这个激酶也作为一个去磷酸酶。

sentences.en: To this list of eight is added histidine to meet the demands of growth during childhood.
sentences.cn: 对于儿童来说,还需要增加组氨酸以满足生长的需要.

trans.tran_en: a nonessential amino acid that occurs in most proteins: a precursor of histamine
